name: pebbled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
formed from or covered with small, smooth, round stones: a pebbled beach a pebbled courtyard
having a surface with small, round raised areas on it: a pebbled glass door See
pebble
More examplesFewer examplesThe pebbled walls were colored by leeching minerals.The south-east coast has many sheltered, pebbled beaches.Folding chairs had been set up on the pebbled ground. This is a captivating village with pebbled streets, a pretty square and a church. They had $300 loafers with pebbled rubber soles. Nordic ceiling panel has a smoothly pebbled texture.
